attributes.action: Keep the Cap on Top-Up Fees and say no to a market in Higher Education
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We believe,
• Education is the greatest determinant of social mobility.
• Lifting the cap on top-up fees will escalate the marketisation of education.
• Because one thing we know about markets is that people with less money buy cheaper products, this will lead to entry being dependent on affordability rather than ability.
• This will further increase the gap in society between the premium educated rich and the economy educated poor.

Hence, we want:
• The cap on University top-up fees to be kept at £3,000.
• Fair access to education - entry on ability not affordability.
• You to add your voice to the campaign right here!
